data.title: Compression
data.solution:
open System

let orders = Console.ReadLine()

let result =
    orders.Split ' '
    |> Array.map(fun order ->
        match order with
        | "up" -> "^"
        | "down" -> "v"
        | "left" -> "<"
        | "right" -> ">"
    )
    |> Array.fold(fun s v ->
        match s with
        | []  -> 
            [(v, 1)]
        | x::xs when fst x = v -> 
            (v, (snd x) + 1) :: xs
        | arr ->
            (v, 1) :: arr
    ) []
    |> List.rev
    |> List.fold (fun s v ->
        if snd v > 1 then
            sprintf "%s%s%d" s (fst v) (snd v)
        else
            sprintf "%s%s" s (fst v)
    ) ""
    
printf "%s" result

testCases.title: More simple steps
testCases.testIn: down left up right up left right up left down

testCases.title: More of the same
testCases.testIn: right right right up up up

testCases.title: More of more of the same
A small trip
testCases.testIn: up up down left left up up right down down right right

testCases.title: Another small trip
testCases.testIn: down down up right right left left up down down up up

testCases.title: Let's go for a ride
testCases.testIn: up down down down down right right right right left left left up up up up up up down left left left left right right left right

testCases.title: Let's go for another ride
testCases.testIn: down up up up up up left left down down down down right right right right right up up down up

testCases.title: Can you count?
testCases.testIn: up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up

testCases.title: One step wrong
testCases.testIn: right up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up up

data.constraints:
Orders can be: {{up}} {{down}} {{left}} {{right}}
Number of orders < 30
data.inputDescription: A line containing the orders, separated by spaces.
data.outputDescription: A line with the compressed orders without spaces.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

We want to control a robot with a specific set of orders: up down left right.
Sadly our robot doesn't like long statements, it only understands ^ v < >.
Additionally we want to avoid repeating orders, if we have more than one of the same orders, we indicate the repetition with a number after the order: up up up -> ^3
Input
A line containing the orders, separated by spaces.
Output
A line with the compressed orders without spaces.
Constraints
Orders can be: up down left right
Number of orders < 30
Example
Input
up up right down left
Output
^2>v<
